item.title: how to change boot in a lenovo laptop
item.description: #bios You should turn off and on the laptop and then use the where is the novo button in lenovo laptops to select boot menu and continue with the installation.

item.title: how to configure rufus to install kali linux
item.description: #os/linux #bios open rufus select you kali image select your device (USB) partition scheme as “MBR” Target system as BIOS or UEFI label it file system as FAT32 (default) cluster size as 8192 bytes (default) References steps to create a kali bootable usb with rufus

item.title: Introducción al botón NOVO - ideapad
item.description: #bios Introducción al botón NOVO - ideapad Extracts U arrow hole to boot lenovo laptop Novo button symbol References source https://support.

item.title: where is the novo button in lenovo laptops
item.description: #bios Is at the side of the charging power and U arrow hole to boot lenovo laptop ![[IMG_20220720_133234.jpg]]
